segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring onto the floor, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting there, hoping to get a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really pay more attention to what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and tidy, unlike the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get caught before they get their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading all over the floor, it's going to be a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
